name: Ardent Censer

passives.name: Sanctify
passives.effects: {{tip|Heal|Healing}} or {{tip|shield|shielding}} allied champions (''excluding yourself'') enhances you and them for 6 seconds, granting {{as|25% '''bonus''' attack speed|attack speed}} and {{as|20 '''bonus''' magic damage}} [[on-hit]] on basic attacks.

effects_structured.raw: Healing/shielding allies grants bonus attack speed and on-hit magic damage for 6s (self and ally).
On-hit bonus magic damage during Sanctify.

simpleDescription: Shield and heal effects on other units grant both of you Attack Speed and their attacks deal additional on-hit magic damage.

schema_notes.effects_structured: Parsed from passive/active text for simulation use.
